about_the_game:
This Small World "A Spider's Web" mini expansion contains:
• 3 new Races (Ice Witches, Slingmen and Skags)
• 3 Special Powers (Lava, Copycat and Soul-Touch).
Carve out your place in a world that is too small to accommodate everyone!
